title: Grading system
body:
Okay does anyone feel like the end of game grading system is fucked? Cause i constantly find myself expecting an S and then getting an A or lower. In My last game, i went 8/0/2 as twitch in a 22 kill game. I thought ' i definatly have to get an S here' but no, i got an A. And then i thought 'maybe its because i didnt have over half of the team kills' but then i saw a jayce on my team who was 7/2/2, and he got an S. How does that work? How does someone with less kills and 2 more deaths get a better grade? I had 0 deaths! You cant really do better, so somebody please explain to me how this damned system works

Much love {{champion:44}}
